thread.section_title: Auto Europe US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Auto Europe US | autoeurope.com | 3 of 221
thread.title: Michael Solomon
thread.title_full: Auto Europe US reviewed by Michael Solomon

author: Michael Solomon
title: Michael Solomon
text: Called the company just to get a rough idea figuring I'd get the "brush-off" from a sales rep as i was not ready to confirm any final details, BOY WAS I WRONG!! My sales rep Damon was very knowledgeable, professional, courteous, and informative. Got an EXCELLENT deal on a car rental that saved my trip! definitely recommend using their excellent services.
